title: Simple Nginx Web Server
description: This service deploys a simple Nginx web server on a Kubernetes cluster. The deployment consists of a single pod running the Nginx container. This is a basic example to demonstrate how to deploy a web server using Kubernetes.

k8s_manifests.content:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
